page.title: 10POINTON-HOME LIFE & CUSTOMS
page.content: {A Saturday In My Life;(by my twin {sister,Gillian):}I generally get up early and after breakfast,I go outside.Sometimes I help my father in the garden or play games with my sisters.I help with the housework, although I hate it.One o'clock is dinner time.I love going shopping in nearby towns. i.e. Bourne or Sleaford. {POINTON FEAST { }This old custom was revived about 10 years ago.Funds for the village are raised by holding a feast where the villagers enjoy events such as brass bands playing,a hot air balloon display,a vintage car rally,a dog show,a Horticultural show and Art & Craft displays. {
